Get.Statement: SELECT w2_CsShareInfo.*, w2_ShopOperator.name, A.share_count, B.read_count FROM w2_CsShareInfo LEFT JOIN w2_ShopOperator ON ( w2_CsShareInfo.dept_id = w2_ShopOperator.shop_id AND w2_CsShareInfo.sender = w2_ShopOperator.operator_id ) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT w2_CsShareInfoRead.info_no, COUNT(*) AS share_count -- 全件数 FROM w2_CsShareInfoRead INNER JOIN w2_ShopOperator ON ( w2_CsShareInfoRead.dept_id = w2_ShopOperator.shop_id AND w2_CsShareInfoRead.operator_id = w2_ShopOperator.operator_id AND w2_ShopOperator.valid_flg = 1 ) -- オペレータ存在チェック GROUP BY w2_CsShareInfoRead.dept_id, w2_CsShareInfoRead.info_no HAVING w2_CsShareInfoRead.dept_id = @dept_id ) AS A ON ( w2_CsShareInfo.info_no = A.info_no ) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT w2_CsShareInfoRead.info_no, COUNT(*) AS read_count -- 既読件数 FROM w2_CsShareInfoRead INNER JOIN w2_ShopOperator ON ( w2_CsShareInfoRead.dept_id = w2_ShopOperator.shop_id AND w2_CsShareInfoRead.operator_id = w2_ShopOperator.operator_id AND w2_ShopOperator.valid_flg = 1 ) -- オペレータ存在チェック WHERE w2_CsShareInfoRead.read_flg = '1' GROUP BY w2_CsShareInfoRead.dept_id, w2_CsShareInfoRead.info_no HAVING w2_CsShareInfoRead.dept_id = @dept_id ) AS B ON ( w2_CsShareInfo.info_no = B.info_no ) WHERE w2_CsShareInfo.dept_id = @dept_id AND w2_CsShareInfo.info_no = @info_no

Search.Statement:
-- 件数取得 DECLARE @row_count int; SELECT @row_count = ISNULL(COUNT(1), 0) FROM w2_CsShareInfo WHERE [[ Search_Where ]]
SELECT w2_CsShareInfo.*, w2_ShopOperator.name, A.share_count, B.read_count, @row_count AS row_count FROM ( SELECT w2_CsShareInfo.dept_id, w2_CsShareInfo.info_no, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY [[ Search_OrderBy ]]) AS row_num FROM w2_CsShareInfo WHERE [[ Search_Where ]] ) AS RowIndex LEFT JOIN w2_CsShareInfo ON ( w2_CsShareInfo.dept_id = RowIndex.dept_id AND w2_CsShareInfo.info_no = RowIndex.info_no ) LEFT JOIN w2_ShopOperator ON ( w2_CsShareInfo.dept_id = w2_ShopOperator.shop_id AND w2_CsShareInfo.sender = w2_ShopOperator.operator_id ) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT w2_CsShareInfoRead.info_no, COUNT(*) AS share_count -- 全件数 FROM w2_CsShareInfoRead INNER JOIN w2_ShopOperator ON ( w2_CsShareInfoRead.dept_id = w2_ShopOperator.shop_id AND w2_CsShareInfoRead.operator_id = w2_ShopOperator.operator_id AND w2_ShopOperator.valid_flg = 1 ) -- オペレータ存在チェック GROUP BY w2_CsShareInfoRead.dept_id, w2_CsShareInfoRead.info_no HAVING w2_CsShareInfoRead.dept_id = @dept_id ) AS A ON ( w2_CsShareInfo.info_no = A.info_no ) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT w2_CsShareInfoRead.info_no, COUNT(*) AS read_count -- 既読件数 FROM w2_CsShareInfoRead INNER JOIN w2_ShopOperator ON ( w2_CsShareInfoRead.dept_id = w2_ShopOperator.shop_id AND w2_CsShareInfoRead.operator_id = w2_ShopOperator.operator_id AND w2_ShopOperator.valid_flg = 1 ) -- オペレータ存在チェック WHERE w2_CsShareInfoRead.read_flg = '1' GROUP BY w2_CsShareInfoRead.dept_id, w2_CsShareInfoRead.info_no HAVING w2_CsShareInfoRead.dept_id = @dept_id ) AS B ON ( w2_CsShareInfo.info_no = B.info_no ) WHERE @bgn_row_num <= RowIndex.row_num AND RowIndex.row_num <= @end_row_num ORDER BY RowIndex.row_num ASC

Update.Statement: UPDATE w2_CsShareInfo SET w2_CsShareInfo.info_text_kbn = @info_text_kbn, w2_CsShareInfo.info_text = @info_text, w2_CsShareInfo.info_kbn = @info_kbn, w2_CsShareInfo.info_importance = @info_importance, w2_CsShareInfo.date_changed = getdate(), w2_CsShareInfo.last_changed = @last_changed WHERE w2_CsShareInfo.dept_id = @dept_id AND w2_CsShareInfo.info_no = @info_no

Delete.Statement: DELETE w2_CsShareInfo WHERE w2_CsShareInfo.dept_id = @dept_id AND w2_CsShareInfo.info_no = @info_no
